turns.answer: Well, you're supposed to be part of Mafia, right? You're supposed to play a Mafia game. You're supposed to get the Mafia to win, but at the end of the day, it's not real. You're playing

turns.answer:
I was the only player who made it from 12-1 in 2 hours, while still being in the house, and did not take any drugs.

Question: What happens if you die?

Answer: I get on my
